This can best be achieved by inviting other professional musicians such as a drummer, bassist, and maybe another guitarist to accompany me in the studio. 

$25,000 will help with the following expenses:

Studio Time
Musician Fees
Record Mastering
Website Development & Social Media Management
Download Site Fees & Administration 
Launch Events
Performance Space
Perk Fulfillment
PR Announcements/Press Releases


Making Herstory  
So, I’ve organized this crowdfunding campaign to generate income to record, mix, and master these singer/songwriter tracks and I’m asking you to help me fund the project. As a thank-you for all contributions $10.00 and more, you will receive a download of my new album, Everyone Is the Light! and other perks listed for various contribution levels. Please add a perk if you'd like one – I will gladly send it to you! 

I’m going for the gusto!
I’m really excited about this and at the same time a bit nervous. But I know it will all turn out great – with your help and support, I will succeed. Won’t you please share your light with me and help me get my new album recorded? Please say YES!
Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart!

Visit my webpage for more info: www.FranciaMcNally.com.

story:
This is a completely different project than any other I've done. Focusing on Duke Ellington music from the 1920s to his most contemporary work I use the influence of the greatest trumpet players and others to make the different trumpet sounds. This includes Bubba Miley, Clifford, Woody Shaw, Cat Anderson, Bill Evans and intervalic ideas learned for Dave Liebman.  

    I use 4 Harmon mutes on one tune and 4 flugels on another to create interesting textures.  As many as 9 trumpet parts are used on one tune to achieve a different sounds. Each tune was chosen to feature a great player in history and I do my best to change my approach to achieve  that sound.  Bobby Shew's flugel sound with Woody's harmonic approach. Of course no one can do that but I try.  I thought no one would want to listen to trumpet for the length of a cd so I've used every combination of mutes and flugel to keep it interesting. 

    My  goal here is to get this to as many trumpet players, band directors and anyone who enjoys jazz.  This is why I would like to offer this new cd for less than a cup of coffee at Starbucks. $5 a cd! Of course this is a fund raising project and if you want to donate more toward the cause the would help too, but if you have five students that might enjoy or learn from this please just send me the $25 and I'll send five CDs when they are completed. 

   Passing this on is just as important as donating because I'd like to get these to as many people as possible.  From the people who have heard this projected they have been surprised by the variety and also how interesting and historical in some ways it is. 

   Most of the money is going toward paying for the production of the CDs. This includes full art work and jewel case ($1,591). There is also some Mastering and edit fees I will have to pay. Shipping and promotion are the last two things your help will go toward paying. 

   If we reach our goal. Any extra money will go  toward more promotion and getting the CDs to reviewers and radio stations. 

   Thanks for your time and consideration- Tony

story:
Today, when IT technology become an integral part of our lives, it is difficult to imagine the world without such software product as a music player.

             I will not list the great variety of players and their functions, as this is not covered by this paper. However, it should be mentioned that no player at today’s market can boast such function as smart automatic playlist creation based on user preferences. 

              What do I mean? It’s easy. How often you choose music, record it on your player, smartphone or flash drive? You spend some time listening to tracks, thinking: “I will certainly listen to this one” and collect a certain number of tracks on you audio device. Then the situation is as follows: you begin your exercise and start music... You hear a song that you’ve chosen, you like it, but don’t want to listen to it right now. So you start switching, until you find a suitable one. 

It all would be great, but the situation gets worse when you listen to a song for about 40 seconds and then still switch it. You don’t want it at the moment. So the whole process turns into an endless switching of tracks, which you’ve chosen yourself. At that time you thought that all track were great and you would listen to them all. Such situations are numerous! It’s the same in the car, in the bathroom, while jogging and even when making love. Yes, this can happen too. Eventually we keep adding tracks and the situation gets even worse. We just have no time to delete some tracks or create playlists. The same thing is with playlists. We switch them from song to song depending on current preferences.

With certain software support, the algorithm that we are developed enables smart tracking of user’s actions, creating and sorting playlists depending on user’s actions, e.g. in the car,  in a gym etc.

Just imaging: you’ve loaded some tracks. You turn on the device, select a mode (gym, car, walk etc.), start listening and switch the tracks you don’t like or not ready to listen right now. Next time when you turn on the player and select the mode, you will hear exactly what you wanted, even without noticing it. You may switch a few tracks more, but every time when you turn on the music, you will listen to the ones you like and get the most from your current activity. 

The most interesting is that the algorithm also provides for exclusion of songs you get tired of. We all understand that a person can simply start to dislike a track and will switch it. The player will react to this and the next time your playlist will change automatically.

This feature of smart playlist creation is simply indispensable for athletes, drivers, and people who just live with headphones in their ears.

story:
Merci de  votre  visite  sur  cette  page

Je  M' appelle Gérald Le Huec,je  suis Guitariste depuis   pas  mal  d 'années  et  j ai  une  passion énorme  pour  le  rock,  et le  Metal.

Je  bosse depuis  deux ans  sur  la réalisation d 'un album qui rassemble toutes mes influences, vous trouverez quelques extraits  vidéos de  mes enregistrements  ici et  sur  U tube

Aujourdhui  il  semble  que  les  musiciens amateurs  ne  soient    autorisés  a  ne  vivre  que  au travers  des  covers  (Amateur  ne  veut  pas dire sans expérience, ni travail   bâclé, j ai déjà  réalisé  un album    instrumental  et un  album pour mon groupe  Metal Primitiv Act.,)
 pour  ma part je ne prétend  pas  à  être   le  meilleur  mais  simplement de  vous proposer de réelles compositions  qui reflètent  mon amour de la  musique en  vous  proposant   un album réalisé  professionnellement
cet album sera un receuil de mes 'influences,  rock,  blues , metal
J’espère aussi donner  l 'envie  à des musiciens  très talentueux de s 'aventurer dans  la  composition  et de faire  un album.
Ce  projet  instrumental sera  réalisé par Thibault Morin(ex batteur de Bukowski et actuel Hell Of ride)
La qualité sera  donc au rendez  vous ,je  pense  donc  réussir  a  mener ce projet jusqu 'au  bout.
Réunir  un  budget n 'est pas simple  ,mais à l  heure   ou la  musique  est devenue un produit  "fast food" il est   très difficile d obtenir  des soutiens  professionnels, c'est  pour cela que je  compte sur  vous
Si vous ne pouvez pas  financièrement  alors  juste de  la pub  sera  d une grande  aide en  utilisant  les  outils de partage  sur Indie Gogo  ou F Book
Je  vous remercie  infiniement
Guitaristiquement  votre

L'impact

N'hésitez pas à expliquer votre projet plus en détail et indiquez aux visiteurs en quoi leur contribution fera la différence :

  • Expliquez pourquoi votre projet est précieux pour le contributeur et pour le monde.
  • Mettez en avant vos expériences réussies sur des projets tels que celui-ci (si vous en avez).
  • Rendez votre projet concret aux yeux des visiteurs et suscitez la confiance.

Risques et défis

Les gens apprécieront la transparence de vos propos. Soyez ouvert et démarquez-vous en exposant les risques et les obstacles auxquels vous allez peut-être faire face pour atteindre votre objectif.

  • Expliquez pourquoi vous pensez être en mesure de relever ces défis.
  • Décrivez comment vous comptez résoudre ces éventuels problèmes.

D'autres façons d'aider

Certaines personnes ne peuvent pas contribuer mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider :

  • Demandez aux gens de passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour de votre projet.
  • Rappelez-leur d'utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo !

Et le tour est joué.

story:
Hi there Sup!

I am Dope Lee the rapper; I need you to help me make the music video of my new single “Masturbate” come into reality!!!:)

Check my single “Masturbate” here:

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/dopeleereal/masturbate

Check my full interview of the crowdfunding project:


Vimeo Version of the interview: https://vimeo.com/143088583

  • I am a rapper and I am a straight man with an open attitude of true self-expression (wearing some type of "outlandish hustle" clothes and more importantly, just be yourself!).
  • I love Rap & Hip Hop and I have connections to great friends in Hip Hop community internationally.
  • I have released my 2 mixtapes through Datpiff.com and my new single “Masturbate” had been produced and engineered by an excellent Atlanta Studio.
  • I like all "dope" things, cool things and inspiring things!!!
  • My friends call me “Dope Is Every Tin” , I call myself “Dope Of Da Dough”


I was born on June 7th, 1985, in Mianyang, Sichuan, China, rebellious as a school kid, I had a lot of trouble in school, my passion at the time is all about arcade games like Street Fighter, Anime and Nintendo in my home, I was suppressed and felt bored about those courses in school and I had involved in tons of interesting and rebellious things such as climbing out of school walls (in China we had walls in primary school) to play games or fight with other lousy children and I started a big movement in my school involving a teaching-reform as a lot of students couldn’t take the rote learning system so well but failed in doing so due to various reasons based on reality, I learned the importance of self-expression in a traditional Chinese culture environment and I began to probe my philosophical existence, I began to read and listen to human wisdoms and to love music of a various forms at this stage.

Hip Hop is the new window for me at my last few years in primary school and junior middle school; I began to listen to a lot of great rappers and groups like N.W.A, 2 Pac, Biggie, Puff Daddy and Snoop Dogg, The liberating side and self-expression side of the music began to facilitate my self-thinking and self-discovering process, I learnt the B-boy dance when I reached 19 and I began to immerse into the Hip Hop culture and I began to do some experiments with my voice and try recording them on the tape.

I always position myself to be a straight guy and I always have a straight relationship with females, however, I pursue the female beauty to the extent that I want to try it on me to combine some unique style, I want to appeal to my fans and let the world understand that there is no difference whether you wear a skirt or jeans if you are a guy, nor if you wear male suits and ties if you are a girl, I don’t give a F! Self-expression is important in your life and definitely crucial in fashion, so I declare that there shall be no boundaries between your gander and sexuality, I am no gay buh I don’t give a D who you are, you just be yourself! Be Proud! The dressing style should never be limited to the reality based on your gender.

So far, I have been devoting myself to my music production and music career, and I dedicate myself to the constant improvement of my music and my presence, my major fans include straight as well as LGBT community, It’s just what you hear and what you understand, It’s just not what I made, so I am working to make the world a better place, to make you guys more confident about who you are and what you are into!  

So I ask you to join the movement and share our energy and dreams with this great opportunity!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/dopeleereal

Datpiff Release:

Mixtape <You Never Stop You>: http://piff.me/bfb3dc8

New Ep <Masturbate Dope Ep>: http://piff.me/50c4409

Spotify: https://play.spotify.com/artist/5XCBFEMASATvt6XvZ44Q7E

Reverbnation: https://www.reverbnation.com/dopelee

Bandcamp: https://dopelee.bandcamp.com/

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/dopeleereal

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dopeleeofficial

Official Website: http://www.dopelee.com/

Artist EPK: http://paperwingsmedia.com/private/124588332407/tumblr_nrsrxxEtIp1taccxi

Every perk comes with a digital download of my project single in 32k quality!

Dope Lee wants to bring you a trilling music video themed “Masturbate”! Over these years we’ve been being numbed by our senses of Hip Hop music and yet there is a new game changer and funny & charismatic rap artist Dope Lee, Dope Lee comes to bring you a whole new difference of style and music, with the purposeful voice in my head “Just do da tin! Just do it! Just be who you wanna be and let people be who they wanna be, and Masturbate is an ultimate form of self-expression”, don’t get me wrong though, He just wants to give all of ya a fun time! Let’s shake shake dance da tin!

“WOW, the first time to hear such a song! I think it means a lot to me and it's really funny in a "bad" way, Dope Lee is just like his name and I LOVE him!” ---Clara (Amazon music fan)

“totally a New direction, electronic rap would be just a beginning for this rapper, incredibly brainwashing music from Dope Lee, now I'm a big fan of him.” --- Tia (Amazon music fan)

“some fresh beat and fresh jumps, projected a great and impressive visual in my brain cells~” ---Destiny (Amazon music fan)

“I'd say the beat really goes well with his voice definitely a nice song!” ---Bob (Amazon music fan)

“Dope Lee's new single named Masturbate by the rapper Dope Lee, is aiming to advocate the fun and free side of life, to express an unique bossy feeling about things that get your nerves and frustrate you, to cheer up, to be yourself and stand up as a pride bo$$!” ---THISIS50

This track was recorded in Shanghai, China by a Chinese Hip Hop OG rapper and recording engineer and co-produced & engineered by an excellent sound engineer in Atlanta, USA, who had produced for some excellent rappers like Rich Homie Quan, Forte Bowie and Trinidad James. Upon the success of this track I will be able to give you more details of the excellent production, now allow me to remain a little mysterious on my single.

For the music video of my single “Masturbate” to be filmed, I have got a $5,000 loan locally and I want to raise the rest of my project through crowd funding, my project goal is $20,000 for the basic needs of the MV filming, and I should have about $70,000 for optimum results to get the decent presentation and that’s the budget needed to reach that great standard.

It’s just not only about the money, it’s also about you! My supporters and People who love me as an artist! I want to do this project for you! I want to show to the world that I’m proud of who I am and I want to convey that dope energy and uplifting vibe to every single one of you!

Perk Prizes Merchandise List:

Signed CD of my single "Masturbate"

Campaign T-shirt #1: Straight Outta Dope Lee 1

Campaign T-shirt #2: Straight Outta Dope Lee 2

Campaign T-shirt #3: Straight Outta Dope Lee 3

Campaign T-shirt #4: Straight Outta Masturbate 1

Campaign T-shirt #5: Straight Outta Masturbate 2

Campaign T-shirt #6: Straight Outta Masturbate 3

Our T-shirt sizes are the standard unisex sizes, please make sure that you inbox me on Facebook with all details including your size and T-shirt model number, etc.

Campaign Mug #1

Campaign Mug #2

Campaign Mug #3

Campaign Mug #4

Campaign Mug #5

The final MV shooting will be decided on the budget and schedule, currently I have 2 major companies and some great individual studios to choose to work on this project:

Lutimedia and Weweremonkeys(WWM) are the 2 major companies:

About Lutimedia

Lutimedia is associated with Director X for the production of many great music videos, Director X had been producing the top level music videos for the world famous music stars like: Nicki Minaj, Drake, Iggy Azalea, R Kelly, Pharrell, Common, XZIBIT and other top stars. The film of my song will be surely one of the most artistic、impressive and powerful music videos out there, the quality will be superb. The reliability of this team has been well proved for the records in the music industry.

Official Website: http://www.lutimedia.com/

Wikipedia Of Luti: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luti_Fagbenle

(Part of the programs Lutimedia had done )

About Weweremonekeys

Weweremonkeys featuring a unique artistic style highlighted with cutting edge visual technology, had done amazing MV for famous artists like of Monsters And Men, Azealia Banks, Dawn Richard and so on, their vision and avant garde style is really eye catching and always has deep meaning behind the surface.

Official Website: http://wwm.productions/index.php

I had sent this track to Lutimedia and WWM earlier this year and I had positive feedback and they had expressed deep interests in make a music video for this song! We had discussed the budget and major story frame of the MV, and It will be a impressive MV to get people sharing and talking just like Gangnam style in 2012!

This track will be as hot as xxx! Like Masnam Style :)! People will share and talk about it and it will set off as fire!

Flim Crew Highlights

Reference projects from Director X:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLT0udKPyE9o1rtypi9vtt6okDtuZZgsIz

(Including the hit of "Drake-Starting From The Bottom" "2chainz-No Lie” “Jay Z-Excuse Me Miss ft.Pharrel" and so many hit songs)

Drake - Starting From The Bottom:


T.I - No Mediocre ft. Iggy Azalea:


Reference projects from WWM (Weweremonkeys):

Dawn Richard - Tide https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FszEaxrHGTs

Azealia Banks - Ice Princess: 


1.  The crowdfunding process, I need the required funding met to begin my formal preparation and filming stages.

2.  The preparation stage, I will set out the detail plan with the film production company regarding the filming location, project time points, storyline and many other details. I will also prepare my visa if my filming location to be in London, UK or Los Angles, US at this stage.

3.  Filming process, it will take place within 1-3days. I can meet up with my fans and sponsors after or in this stage (refer to Perk 8 ,10 and 11)

4.  Production process, it may take between 1-2 weeks for the perfection of the music video.

5.  Release and Promotion, I will post to professional Hip Hop video website including WorldStarHipHop.com (WSHH) and some other famous channels such as VEVO and YouTube (I can open my VEVO channel using this video for my application). At the same time, the maximum usage of social media and promo services can be effective and the word of mouth is more important in contributing to the success of this track.

6.  When the production and release have been done, all perks for my supporters will be fulfilled (some perk prizes will be fulfilled in the process of MV shooting already, refer to Perk 8 and 10).

Can’t afford to pitch in right now? We get it; This is a great sensational music fun movement, after all. If you still feel strongly about helping our music fun movement happen, there is still an important way that you can help us out without too much commitments from your  wallet.

Talk is free. Share links to our campaign page on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or even bring up our project next time that you’re among friends. Your little help can always help in some most unexpected ways.

Have another question? Post on the Indiegogo comment thread above. For media, creative or business inquiries please e-mail us at dopeleelyk@gmail.com – we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.

     myself “Dope Of Da Dough”


I was born on June 7th, 1985, in Mianyang, Sichuan, China, rebellious as a school kid, I had a lot of trouble in school, my passion at the time is all about arcade games like Street Fighter, Anime and Nintendo in my home, I was suppressed and felt bored about those courses in school and I had involved in tons of interesting and rebellious things such as climbing out of school walls (in China we had walls in primary school) to play games or fight with other lousy children and I started a big movement in my school involving a teaching-reform as a lot of students couldn’t take the rote learning system so well but failed in doing so due to various reasons based on reality, I learned the importance of self-expression in a traditional Chinese culture environment and I began to probe my philosophical existence, I began to read and listen to human wisdoms and to love music of a various forms at this stage.
Hip Hop is the new window for me at my last
few years in primary school and junior middle school; I began to listen to a
lot of great rappers and groups like N.W.A, 2 Pac, Biggie, Puff Daddy and Snoop
Dogg, The liberating side and self-expression side of the music began to facilitate
my self-thinking and self-discovering process, I learnt the B-boy dance when I
reached 19 and I began to immerse into the Hip Hop culture and I began to do
some experiments with my voice and try recording them on the tape.
I always position myself to be a straight guy
and I always have a straight relationship with females, however, I pursue the female
beauty to the extent that I want to try it on me to combine some unique style,
I want to appeal to my fans and let the world understand that there is no
difference whether you wear a skirt or jeans if you are a guy, nor if you wear
male suits and ties if you are a girl, I don’t give a F! Self-expression is
important in your life and definitely crucial in fashion, so I declare that
there shall be no boundaries between your gander and sexuality, I am no gay buh
I don’t give a D who you are, you just be yourself! Be Proud! The dressing
style should never be limited to the reality based on your gender. 
So far, I have been devoting myself to my
music production and music career, and I dedicate myself to the constant improvement
of my music and my presence, my major fans include straight as well as LGBT
community, It’s just what you hear and what you understand, It’s just not what
I made, so I am working to make the world a better place, to make you guys more
confident about who you are and what you are into!  So I ask you to join the movement and share our energy and dreams with this great opportunity!

and Masturbate is an ultimate form of self-expression”, don’t get me wrong
though, He just wants to give all of ya a fun time! Let’s shake shake dance da
tin!

a Chinese Hip Hop OG rapper and recording engineer and co-produced &

to be filmed, I have got a $5,000 loan locally and I want to raise the rest of my project through crowd funding, my project goal is $20,000 for the basic needs of the MV filming, and I should have about $70,000 for optimum results to get the decent
presentation and that’s the budget needed to reach that great standard.
It’s just not only about the money, it’s also
about you! My supporters and People who love me as an artist! I want to do this

Can’t afford to pitch in right now? We get it; This is a great sensational music fun movement, after all. If you still feel strongly about helping our music fun movement happen, there is still an important way that you can help us out without too much commitments from your  wallet.
Talk is free. Share links to our campaign page on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or even bring up our project next time that you’re among friends. Your little help can always help in some most unexpected ways.

story:
FIREBIRD SINGERS

LOVERS OF A CAPPELLA MUSIC: WE NEED YOUR HELP TO FINISH OUR INAUGURAL SEASON STRONG!


ABOUT FIREBIRD SINGERS

Firebird Singers is a Charlotte-based vocal ensemble dedicated to a cappella choral artistry, primarily classical in style but including other styles as well.  Like the Firebird sculpture, our mission is to reflect each shining nuance of the music to create a radiant and uplifting experience that will engage the listener.  Donations taken at our concerts go to support local charities.  

About the Firebird – The Firebird is a 17 feet 5 inches high sculpture that sits on a prominent corner of uptown Charlotte.  It is covered with more than 7,500 pieces of mirrored and colored glass that catch the ever-changing reflection of passersby.  Its stature and radiance has an uplifting quality about it, somehow drawing viewers to interact with it.   

    

2015 - 2016  SEASON

Artistic director Marc Williams-Hull and musical director Cathy Youngblood led the opening concert of our first season on September 20, 2015, highlighting modern American composers. 

The remainder of the 2015-2016 season involves two more concerts:  one on February 14, 2016 with a program of love songs, and the other in May 2016 featuring the G minor Mass of Vaughan Williams.  



WHAT WE NEED

Since these concerts will be free to the public, and proceeds go to charity, we need help finishing our season strong!  

Our budget per concert is $2000;                                                                                               $700 to buy music,                                                                                                                     $400 rental fee for rehearsal and performance space,                                                     $200 for postage and printing, and a                                                                                           $700 recording fee,                                                                                                                       for a grand total of $4000 for both concerts to finish the season. 

A cappella singing is growing in popularity!  It has an almost magical way of engaging singers and audience alike.  If we are unable to reach our goal, our concerts won’t happen, and local charities won’t be helped.  Thanks for doing what you can to keep that from happening.


The Big Question WHY?  Would you want to support this particular group   

Because you would be participating in the start of and continuation of an exciting performance group in the Charlotte NC area, the only group that explores exclusively the classical a cappella repertoire.

Because FireBird singers is a group whose mission is not to just create beautiful music but is committed to using their concerts to fund raise for charitable causes at each and every concert.

Because in doing so you are enabling an audience to come to our performances for free.

Because you realize just how difficult it is to get a group like this started and you want to help.


WHAT IF WE GO OVER OUR GOAL?  

Firebird Singers selects and announces a charity for each concert.  Our September concert (performed in two locations) benefitted both Gracious Greens Garden, a ministry in Concord, NC growing nutritious produce for distribution to local food charity programs, and Justice Ministries, a nonprofit organization committed to combating sex trafficking and sexual exploitation of women, with a focus on rescue and housing.  

We pledge that any money we receive through Indiegogo that exceeds our goal will be given to the charity that will be selected for the upcoming concerts.  

  You can help spread the word. You can still help even if you can’t make a monetary contribution.  Please share  our campaign on Facebook or Tweet or any other social media  about supporting this appeal.  Thank you!

story:
Thank you so much for visiting my campaign. I'll assume that if you're reading this, then you might be interested in what I'm raising money for and how your money will be used. I have big plans for Summer 2015 and your support will help makes these plans possible. First, I am finally in the studio recording my original songs! My debut album will be available for purchase as a CD and a digital download. By donating, you will automatically be sent a personalized copy of my album as soon as it is available. In addition, I am working with a great team to film a high-quality music video for my song titled "Takes Away." Further, I am building a media platform to help me keep in touch with fans. The media platform will include a personal website!! I really look forward to keeping in touch with everyone I meet at performances! Finally, I am in need of some new equipment. Once I get my CD recorded, I will be playing more and more shows to get my music out there. I need new cables, stands, and an amp for performing outside. 


I'd like to take this opportunity to share a little about myself and how I got to where I am in my music career today. I am 28 years old and have been playing guitar since I was 15. I am a self taught guitar player and I sang in school choirs since the fourth grade. I was raised by a single dad who has been a big musical inspiration to me. Dad had a lot of health problems when I was growing up and I started working at a pretty young age to help out the family. After a long day of work and school, I would go home to my room where I taught myself to play the Beatles, Radiohead, and Coldplay songs on the guitar. Music was a way for me to escape from the demands of life and relax. Singing and playing guitar was also a way for me to identify with people and make new friends. When I perform nowadays, whether it be at an event, or busking on the street, I am always amazed at how many people I meet and the magnitude of support I receive from everyone. 


For many years, I wasn't always able to play guitar and perform as often as I wished I could. I was raising my son and going to college. When I was in college, I worked full time and held an internship. During that time, I took every opportunity I had to go downtown and perform at local open mic nights. I met many talented and supportive musicians at open mics, and I met people who always encouraged me to "do more" with my music. I've performed at local bars, restaurants, private parties, and community events. In 2014, I was the runner up in a Guitar Center folk singer songwriter competition. In 2015, I was featured as a musical guest on the talk show Inland Empire Alive! 


Well, I've graduated college now and I have a lot more time to spend writing songs, recording, and performing. I'm really looking forward to recording and promoting my CD! I know you have a lot of choices when deciding how to spend your hard earned money, so I want to thank you so much for your generous support of me and my music!!!

story:
We're a grunge/alternative rock band from Tokyo, Japan.  It's been a long, winding road since we started sometime in 2003.  Yes, it's been over 10 years now since we started this band.  During this 10 long years, we've gone through shits and bits, countless drummers and bassists, played many shows, wrote a lot of songs, made albums, toured overseas.  We are very fortunate to have some of the very loyal fans and friends worldwide, who kept supporting us over the years - We will always and forever thank you all.

Earlier this year, we've had a chance to make a contact with legendary Seattle-grunge producer Jack Endino, who recorded Nirvana's first album Bleach, as well as records by Soundgarden, Mudhoney, etc.   He listened to our stuff and liked it, and have agreed to record us in his studio in Seattle. 

This is, by far, the greatest thing that ever happened to us - and this may well be our last chance.  by all means - so we've just got to do everything we can to make this happen, and make this an album of our lives.

So please help us - We've got our previously released albums and EP, as well as newly made original T-shirts, guitar picks, poster and fliers, and the "Making Of" DVD and Demo CD-R as rewards.  All of which have limited numbers - So it's going to be very RARE!   Especially IF and WHEN we'll get signed by a major record label and be famous...   THEN you can sell those things and who knows, it could be 10 times worth the value! 


Thank you all for your love and support, We'll see you on the other side.

xoxo D.O.G.S.

story:
Who I am

I am a self-taught drummer raised in Texas and the Bay Area of California.

In high school I found myself playing with Suicidal Tendencies guitarist Dean Pleasants. I always loved music, and the drive to be a better musician, as well as a deep seated belief in myself, pushed me far from home, to the distant lands of Hungary, the coast of Greece and eventually the United Kingdom. In Europe I was reborn, as a professional musician, and found my home, onstage performing.  There, thousands of miles from America, I came into my own playing drums and performing alongside Harold Brown of Famed Band WAR!

It took me a few years before I came back to the states, as a musician now fully seasoned and ready to take give it my all.  I made the transition from the drums to playing the bass performing alongside Alternative recording artist Trae for Cabana Boy Records. I always loved the energy of bassists Bootsy Collins, Larry Graham and Marcus Miller, and dreamed of the day I could play the bass onstage before a sold out stadium crowd.

I was bassist for the darkly intoxicating 1960’s influenced Dreams4sale project alongside front man/songwriter/producer  Dimi Sloane. A sonic tour de force, we performed in Los Angeles stages our haunting psychedelic blend of Rock and Funk thrilling packed houses at The Viper Lounge, The El Rey, The House of Blues and a performance at The Black Coalition Concert. 

Motivated by the thrilling Dreams4sale experience I embarked on collaboration with the Rock collective Venrez as co-producer instilling a refreshing take on the band’s distilled 1970’s style sound.

Now its time for me to turn the page on a new chapter with my latest collection of songs, recorded at Demiurge Sound in Los Angeles. The cutting edge tracks range from 70’s British Rock influenced haunting ballads to inspirational choral harmonies. 

The Details

My EP is entitled Confess. It is the culmination of the past ten years of my life, a blend of Rock, Alternative, and Funk. It is passionate and painful, my soul laid out, set to music.  My goal is to raise enough financial support to allow me to complete  my debut Ep and support it live .  If you share this experience with me, and Pre-Order the album, you will get to be on the journey with me and you will hear the songs before anyone else. The funds donated will help pay the costs of studio time, paying musicians, mixing, staging, promotion, and other costs for this EP and the subsequent tour.

How your funds are used

Studio and production

Musicians

Mix and mastering

Graphic design and logo

Rehearsal space 

Cd production

Marketing Campaign 


What you get

Please refer to my list of perks. 

Alternatives to Financial Help

If you cannot offer financial support, perhaps you can help in other ways.

You could :

Spread the word on your social networks and  share my links on facebook and Twitter and please share my music sample link:     www.reverbnation.com/freemoor

Send it to someone you think might be interested and willing to lend their support.

I realize everyone is not in a position to give a financial big financial donation.

I also feel good that every little bit helps.   I appreciate any donation you feel in your heart to give. Thank you in advance.

Thank you for taking a look at my page!
story_txt:
Who I am
I am a self-taught drummer raised in Texas and the Bay Area of
California.
In high school I found myself playing with Suicidal Tendencies
guitarist Dean Pleasants. I always loved music, and the drive to be a better
musician, as well as a deep seated belief in myself, pushed me far from home,
to the distant lands of Hungary, the coast of Greece and eventually the United
Kingdom. In Europe I was reborn, as a professional musician, and found my home,
onstage performing.  There, thousands of
miles from America, I came into my own playing drums and performing alongside Harold Brown of Famed Band WAR!
It took me a few years before I came back to the states, as a
musician now fully seasoned and ready to take give it my all.  I made the
transition from the drums to playing the bass performing alongside
Alternative recording artist Trae for Cabana Boy Records. I always loved the
energy of bassists Bootsy Collins, Larry Graham and Marcus Miller, and dreamed
of the day I could play the bass onstage before a sold out stadium crowd. 
I was bassist for the darkly intoxicating 1960’s influenced
Dreams4sale project alongside front man/songwriter/producer  Dimi Sloane.
A sonic tour de force, we performed in Los Angeles stages our haunting psychedelic
blend of Rock and Funk thrilling packed houses at The Viper Lounge, The El Rey,
The House of Blues and a performance at The Black Coalition Concert.  
Motivated by the thrilling Dreams4sale experience I embarked on
collaboration with the Rock collective Venrez as co-producer instilling a
refreshing take on the band’s distilled 1970’s style sound. 
Now its time for me to turn the page on a new chapter with my
latest collection of songs, recorded at Demiurge Sound in Los Angeles. The
cutting edge tracks range from 70’s British Rock influenced haunting ballads to
inspirational choral harmonies.  
The Details
My EP is entitled Confess. It is the culmination of the past ten
years of my life, a blend of Rock, Alternative, and Funk. It is passionate and
painful, my soul laid out, set to music.  My goal is to raise enough financial support to allow me to complete  my debut Ep and support it live .  If you share this experience with me, and Pre-Order the
album, you will get to be on the journey with me and you will hear the songs
before anyone else. The funds donated will help pay the costs of studio time, paying
musicians, mixing, staging, promotion, and other costs for this EP and the
subsequent tour.How your funds are usedStudio and productionMusiciansMix and masteringGraphic design and logoRehearsal space Cd productionMarketing Campaign 
What you get
Please refer to my list of perks. 
Alternatives to Financial Help
If you cannot offer financial support, perhaps you can help in
other ways.
You could :
Spread the word on your social networks and  share my links on
facebook and Twitter and please share my music sample link:     www.reverbnation.com/freemoor
Send
it to someone you think might be interested and willing to lend their support.I realize everyone is not in a position to give a financial big financial donation.I also feel good that every little bit helps.   I appreciate any donation you feel in your heart to give. Thank you in advance.
Thank
you for taking a look at my page!

story:
Empower Radio began as an idea. "What if there was a radio network that was meant to help people. What if we focused on personal development and tried to uplift and inspire our listeners.  Empower them in all areas of their lives? Shine a light on what's right in the world and what's possible. That conversation began over a lunch in 2007. It was scribbled on a napkin and kept as a reminder.

The idea stayed with me as I returned to my radio job. Over time the concept became more fully developed. In March 2009 I resigned from my radio programming job and set out to launch Empower Radio. The full 24-hour network was launched online in April 2009.

The station has run from my apartment, a basement radio studio in Northern Michigan, and now has a studio of it's very own that connects with hosts all over the country. The network has steadily grown by word of mouth. It's the people's network; a truly grass roots movement.

Today Empower Radio has listeners in 89 countries and all 50 states. Listenership is over 500,000 and we just registered our 2-Millionth visit to empoweradio.com. We are heard on iHeart Radio (50 Million users), TuneIn Radio (50 Million users), Stitcher, iTunes, our own Empower Radio app and 10 other syndicated platforms and mobile apps.

Since its beginning, Empower Radio has featured over 2,500 interviews from 20 different hosts. Notable guests have included Wayne Dyer, Doreen Virtue, John Holland, Mark Nepo, John Gray, Eben Alexander, SARK, Steven Farmer, Marci Shimoff, Gabrielle Bernstein, and Bernie Siegel just to name a few.

The growth is exciting, but brings us to a new place. The more Empower Radio grows, the more our costs increase. The funds raised through this campaign will help us keep up with growing costs, replace outdated computers and software, and upgrade our infrastructure,

Your contributions will also help us develop a new media-rich app and mobile strategy and to reach more people.  We also have opportunities for new hosts and new shows, but we need a boost to get there. We need YOU!

I would like to personally invite you to participate and join this mission. Help us build Empower Radio into the world's largest outlet for positive talk radio. If you are so called, put your money where your heart is. Help us expand this platform for  positive and empowering media and make a difference in people's lives. 

Since not everyone can afford to contribute, even a post or tweet about our IndieGoGo Campaign is greatly appreciated. We've created a few easy to share posts and tweets below to help spread the word.

Thank you for taking time to learn about Empower Radio and our Campaign. Together we can spread more positivity in the world and change lives one listener at a time.

With Gratitude,

Brent Carey
